data.eml:eml: A redescription of To r y m u s sapporoensis Ashmead and description of a new species of Tory m u s Dalman (Hymenoptera: Torymidae) parasitizing Paratephritis fukaii (Diptera: Tephritidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsuo, Kazunori (2010): A redescription of To r y m u s sapporoensis Ashmead and description of a new species of Tory m u s Dalman (Hymenoptera: Torymidae) parasitizing Paratephritis fukaii (Diptera: Tephritidae) in Japan. Zootaxa 2410: 53-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194313
